org.eclipse.incquery.tooling.ui.queryexplorer.util

Class QueryExplorerPatternRegistry

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.eclipse.incquery.tooling.ui.queryexplorer.util.QueryExplorerPatternRegistry

  • public class QueryExplorerPatternRegistry
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility class used by the Query Explorer for the maintenance of registered patterns.
    Author:
    Tamas Szabo
